I was expecting a denim material, but this was a weird fabric. The weight is very thin and it’s not warm at all. It looked like a dollar store purchase. I was so disappointed when I opened it. Needless to say, it went right back.
Very bad fit
Beautiful jacket but 3 sizes too small

This is a great jacket!  I am 5'6, 148lbs, 36D and ordered a medium.  I also ordered it in Green.  I love everything about it, other than the is too big for my liking.  I prefer things to be more fitted and this is too big and boxy on me.  I'm really hoping the small works because it is really cute and different.  I'm also going to get it in another color as the green shade didn't look great against my skin tone, but it is a really nice green. I can't wait to get it in a small!
It’s cute, the material is nice, but no pockets like you’d expect for a jacket
Really like the color! The corduroy is also nice. Good quality and great value for the money.

I am 5’7”, 145 lbs which is important when writing a review.  I bought this jacket in a Large and fit is perfect.  I have room to wear a long sleeve turtleneck under it on a cool day.  It is super cute with my black jeans.  I would recommend.
no pockets its a coat most coats have pockets not happy with product
Bought for my daughters for Christmas. They both loved them!
fits nice
Good quality and fits as expected. I’ve received complements each time I’ve worn it. A good substitute and much more stylish than my old lady sweaters.

Great top! I am 5'4" 145 pounds and a size medium fits good as an oversized chunky shirt. The back is long enough to cover my rear end and the sleeves are long which I long.  It's thick and warm, making it great for lounging around the house or on a nice fall day.
Love this jacket.  Goes with everything.
Love this jacket…. It fit perfect, super cute, comfortable..

评论概述: Thin and sizing is just off
评论详情: It seems like everytime I order from China, their sizing is just way off. I don't know what it is. I use their US size and it's just off. If I order larger, it's just too big but the right size is just off and doesn't fit right. I'm convinced it's something more than sizing like the cut is off or something. Anyway, this shirt was cute but super thin and just didn't fit right. It was huge on me, not oversized and cute but baggy and large.
Love the color and style. Arrived earlier than expected.

评论概述: Great fit, wish it had pockets
评论详情: Love the jacket, nice fit, no pockets though.

I bought this as a gift for a 24 year old and she loves it. Lots of Oohs and Ahhs when it was opened. The colors match the picture. It’s well made and the fit was expected. I bought a Medium and it was true to size.
Beautiful shirt jacket. Colors are great. Bought pink and purple. Recipients loved them. Vibrant colors. Good buy.
If you have short arms don't get this.
Ordered the khaki jacket and didn't look like the picture when it arrived. Not comfortable. We will be sending it back.
Looks good & fits great. Many compliments.

I have this in pink & black also, so cute, love the style, the pattern and the color and the fit has bn perfect for layering or just a tank or shirt underneath. I will work my way up to saving so I can order more colors!

I've received so many compliments on this jacket. The contrast between the denim and the plaid is very eye catching. If I could change one thing, I would add pockets.

I really like the style- wish there were side pockets and that it was just a bit heavier but overall it's nicely made.  Arm length is a little long but better than too short. I like loose fit clothing, it's a bit snug at the waiste when buttoned.
I loved this. It made our fall pictures pop. It's true to size and super cute.

Looks cute, exactly like the photos, but definitely runs big. I ordered an XL,could've gone with a L, maybe even a M. But if you want to wear it over something kind of bulky, it'll be fine. NO POCKETS!  Soft. Nice color. Easy to throw on. Maybe more expensive than necessary but it’ll do. I still think pockets would make it perfect.

评论概述: Cute but Care Instructions are a pain
评论详情: I love this, it's warm. However, is says machine washable, but lay flat to dry. If you are limited in time or space to do so, and if you hate the feel of clothes that are not tumble dried, as well as looking potentially creased from laying flat then it's not worth it.
Looks great. Soft and warm.
The jacket it’s really well and it looks really nice. It’s a great in between jacket and colder days. I pair it with a vest.
Material is almost see through
I want every color! Well worth buying. I’m 160 and medium fits great
The picture makes this jacket look like partly a jean jacket but it’s not. This is very thin and sweater like. Sent mine back.
I love mine and receive lots of compliments!

I love this shacket.  It's a good fit, well made, comfortable.  I love the color.  I bought one in light grey and another in light red which is more like a burgundy wine type red, not a xmas red.  Both are perfect for Fall and I will get so much use of them.
Sporting a size medium- 5’7 125lbs- love it!
Did not like the material.  Will probably return.
The item description states that it's oversized. I ordered the recommended size, and the item is too small. Besides that, the item and it's pattern is cute.
Love this jacket/shirt. Fits a little oversized great with jeans or leggings. Quality is good and washes great. I did hang it to dry.

The arms are white wide and the coat is not lined. Which makes it itchy to my skin. Plus the weight of the jacket was deceiving. I will return it.

The jacket is comfortable, and the fabric is soft and flexible. It is an oversized style, but the oversizing extends the sleeves over the hands and the arms are excessive making the jacket look frumpy. Oversized has its fashion desire, but even ordering a medium the sleeve length is only a half an inch smaller. I suggest checking the sizing before you order, I wanted to order again, but a medium will still be too large. I might contemplate a small because Jacket is so nice.
Love the weight and design of both the denim and plaid material. Versatile as far as what to wear underneath for many occasions.
Runs big and feels more like a shirt than a jacket. Wish it had pockets as well.

I think the material is thinner than I thought, not as thick as my denim jacket, but its comfortable and looks as good as the picture shown.  I bought a larger size so I can wear a thicker shirt or sweat shirt under it, and it will be perfect for many occasions.
I ordered an XL thinking it would be more comfortable, but it just looks like I'm wearing my boyfriends jacket.  I wish I had exchanged it for a large, but I didn't want to wait another 2 weeks.

not as thick as I thought it would be but I love it!

Super cute jacket for fall! I ordered the green and the yellow. The yellow is not like the color advertised so I returned it. But I love the green color!
